charges.charge_description: 21:841A=MD.F On or about the date of [2/29/12] in the county of Ector in the Western District of Texas, the defendant did knowingly, aided and abetted by each other, possessed with intent to distribute 50 kilos or more of marijuana inviolation of Title 21 USC 841(a)(1)

21:841A=MD.F MARIJUANA-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-defendant, aided and abetted by others, did possess with intent to distribute 100 kilograms or more of marijuana in violation of Title 21, USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) and Title 18, USC 2. (1)
